attributes.action: when jail sencentance is life we mean life!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why each year we give money to the Goverment to keep prisoners in jail for life, when they recieve good food, clothing and shelter. If these people have been given the sentence 'Life' then the electric chair it should be. More money can be spent in educating the shorter termed prisoners when they go back in to the community and i might just reduce the amound of murderers etc in the first place!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
